description.content: Directly set a user's court role. Requires admin or clerk in target court.

List a user's court roles.
- Admin: returns all court roles.
- Clerk: returns only role for the header court (do not reveal other courts).
Remove a court role from a user. Requires admin or clerk in target court.

List pending court role requests.
- Admin: all pending requests.
- Clerk: only requests for courts they manage.

Approve a pending court role request.
Requires admin or clerk in the request's court.

Deny a pending court role request.
Requires admin or clerk in the request's court.

request.name: Run a live conflict check against existing representations.

description.content:
Returns a list of common federal rules with their deadline calculations.
These are hardcoded reference data based on the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure.
Get a presigned download URL for an attachment.

Proxy download  streams the file bytes through the server with proper
Content-Type and Content-Disposition headers.  Works as a plain `<a href>`
on web, desktop, and mobile (no JS required).
Finalize an attachment upload by checking HEAD and marking uploaded_at.
List uploaded attachments for a docket entry.
Initiate a presigned upload for a new attachment.

query.description: If true, verify object and mark uploaded

description.content:
Link an existing document to a docket entry. Both the entry and document
must belong to the same court tenant.

Promote a docket attachment into a canonical document entry.
The attachment must belong to the tenant and must have been uploaded
(uploaded_at IS NOT NULL). If a document already exists for this
attachment, the existing document is returned (idempotent).

response.name: Document already exists for this attachment
Invalid request or attachment not uploaded

description.content: List audit events for a document. Requires clerk or judge role.

Replace a document with a corrected version. The original is stricken.
Requires clerk role.
Seal a document. Requires clerk or judge role.
Strike a document from the record without replacement. Requires clerk role.
Unseal a document. Requires clerk or judge role.

Submit a unified docket event (text entry, filing, or promote attachment).
Role requirements vary by event kind.

description.content:
Submit an electronic filing. Atomically creates a Document, DocketEntry,
and Filing record. Returns 400 with validation errors if invalid.
Return jurisdiction info for the requesting court.

Initiate a staged file upload for a filing. Returns a presigned PUT URL.
Client uploads directly to S3/RustFS, then calls finalize.

Finalize a staged filing upload by verifying the object exists in S3
and marking it as uploaded.

Validate a filing request without submitting it.
Always returns 200  the response body indicates whether the filing is valid.
Retrieve the persisted Notice of Electronic Filing for a given filing.
